product.text:
The Adventures of Mr. Toad

Young readers will delight in this adventuresome tale featuring one of the most beloved amphibians of all time. Mr. Toad, with his eye on the open road, trades Toad Hall for a stolen red motorcar. When Mr. Toad sets off in undue haste, he lands in jail as a car thief. While Mr. Toad’s antics are sure to bring a smile, the underlying message expresses the importance of taking one’s time and the value of making wise decisions.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to think of an example of a time when she was in a rush, and to express how she felt when she hurried. Together, come up with a few ideas to help prevent the need to rush, such as keeping shoes in a central location or picking out the next day’s school clothes before going to bed.
